thread.section_title: Entertainment and Leisure Businesses For Sale in Canada
thread.title: Landscape Decorative Curbing Business

title: Landscape Decorative Curbing Business
text: Questions Business Summary Very profitable decorative concrete border/curbing business for sale. Complete, ready to work immediately. Just hook up and drive to the job site. Custom goose neck trailer with Tandem 7000 lb axles (14,000 GVW). Mounted mixer, 3 1/2 yard sand box, 40 bag cement bin, equipment bay with ramp, tool bin plus 2 mounted tool boxes, all enclosed and lockable.Equipment included and in excellent condition, contained in the trailer. - Two Tygar extruders for redundancy - Sod cutter and bed edger - 14 moulds - 7 plungers plus sidewalk mould - All trowels for different curb styles - Colored release agents - Integral cable system for added curb strength - 30 concrete stamps - Light grooving saw articulated to fit any curb style plus rope light and connectors - All hand tools, hoses and two wheelbarrows Professionally developed website 2001 Ford F350, 7.3 Diesel, two tone XLT Lariat in great condition Training available. Please call Doug at 250-686-9270 with any questions. Financials Gross Revenues: Seller Will Provide Cash Flow: Seller Will Provide Cash Flow Type: EBITDA
